name: Mad Scientist Style Check
description: Verify code follows Mad Scientist style guide conventions (SCREAMING_SNAKE_CASE for FSM states, golem_ prefix, etc.)

action.message:
Review the open file and check:
1. FSM states use SCREAMING_SNAKE_CASE
2. State variables use golem_ prefix
3. Core functions use SCREAMING_SNAKE_CASE
4. Files are in correct directories per structure.md
5. Only three.js, TypeScript, and Tween.js are used

Report any violations and suggest fixes.
